description: due to its length. PLEASE SEE ATTACHMENT 1 FOR DETAILED REQUIREMENT S... The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
### Multiple Vessel-Specific Spare Parts - Kits
#### Contract Reference: CB-33-48484509
#### Solicitation Reference: W8482-242529/A

**Procurement Information**

* Posted Date: 2024-03-20
* Deadline for Bid Submission: 2024-06-19, 14:00:00
* Contract Expiration Date: N/A
* Classification: Submarines, Submarine Tenders, Naval or Submarine Maneuvers
* Selected Procedure: Request for Proposal

**Bidder Information**

* Bidder's Contact: Darrell Hill, Darrell.Hill@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Information: (000) 000-000-0000 (phone), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contract Details**

* The Department of National Defence invites bids for the delivery of spare parts, specifically:
	+ Item 1: Parts Kit, Ball Valve
		- GSIN: 4820, NSN: 99-4989904
		- Part No.: A103067 - MIS-2906/H N683
		- Quantity: 12, Unit of Issue: KT
		- Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 2: Parts Kit, Ball Valve
		- GSIN: 4820, NSN: 99-4989904
		- Part No.: A103067 - MIS-2906/H N683
		- Quantity: 12, Unit of Issue: KT
		- Delivery Location: CBF Halifax
* Products must be compatible with the specified Part No. and NCAGE.

**Tender Attached Documents**

* [W8482-242529-A Annual Update (001)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34091/w8482-242529-a-amd-001.pdf)
* [Line 2 SOQR](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34091/line-2-soqr.pdf)
* [Line 1 SOQR](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34091/line-1-soqr.pdf)
* [RFP-W8482-242529-A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
